name: Hidden Cats in Rome
description:
Mamma mia! Our cats are now in the great city of Rome! Let's search for them.
A short and pleasant experience in a big and lovely illustration! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic scenario, relax, and find all the cats to reveal the final colored art.



More than 970 hidden objects to find!!!
Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels!


NORMAL MODE

  • Find 120 cats in fixed positions.
  • 5 hints.

ADVANCED MODE

  • Find 200 cats in semi-random positions.
  • 12 Special cats that unlock Bonus Levels and give hints.
  • 20 city people to find and earn hints.



Bonus levels with different sizes and numbers of kittens to find. One use of hint for helping.

  • Gelateria: 50 kittens
  • Osteria: 50 kittens
  • Pastificio: 50 kittens
  • Cat Sanctuary: 75 kittens
  • Basilica: 100 kittens
  • Fontana: 100 kittens
  • Nerd Arena: 100 kittens + 100 people


Accessibility

  • Dark Mode
  • Invert Mouse Zoom
  • Mouse Drag Sensibility
  • Edge Screen Scrolling
  • Color Blindness
